mapper.select: select *, ( ( select incDec from corona_sido where date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") and gubun = #{region} limit 1 )-( select incDec from corona_sido where date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") = date_sub( str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d"), interval 1 day) and gubun = #{region} limit 1 ) )as diff from corona_sido where date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") and gubun = #{region} limit 1
select * from corona_vaccine where DATE_FORMAT(regDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") and sido = #{region};

select gubun from( select (avg(confCaseRate) + avg(deathRate))/2 as danger, gubun ,case when gubun ='0-9' then '0대' when gubun ='10-19' then '10대' when gubun ='20-29' then '20대' when gubun ='30-39' then '30대' when gubun ='40-49' then '40대' when gubun ='50-59' then '50대' when gubun ='60-69' then '60대' when gubun ='70-79' then '70대' when gubun ='80 이상' then '80대 이상' end as ages from corona_age_and_gen where gubun != '남성' and gubun != '여성' and date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") group by gubun order by danger desc limit 1 ) a

select date_sub(date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d"), interval 1 day)as date, defCnt from corona_sido where gubun = #{region} and
date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") and date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") > date_sub(str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d"), interval 14 day) order by createDt asc

select date_sub(date_format(regDt ,"%Y-%m-%d"), interval 1 day) date, (accFirstCnt+firstCnt) as accFirstCnt, (accSecondCnt+secondCnt) as accSecondCnt from corona_vaccine where sido = #{region} and
date_format(regDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") and date_format(regDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") > date_sub(str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d"), interval 14 day) order by regDt asc
